Specific Details: A meeting to discuss our position ahead of the next phase of Brexit, concerning adverse impact of a Duty Free scheme; greater disparities between the tax and regulatory regimes; and cross-border cooperation.
Subject Matter: A meeting to discuss our position ahead of the next phase of Brexit, concerning adverse impact of a Duty Free scheme; greater disparities between the tax and regulatory regimes; and cross-border cooperation.
Intended Results: To share insights and explore possible policy changes and supports.

Specific Details: To help raise awareness of the non-use of Article 20 of the EU Public Procurement Directive in Ireland
Subject Matter: To help raise awareness of the non-use of Article 20 of the EU Public Procurement Directive in Ireland
Intended Results: To ensure that Article 20 of the EU Public Procurement Directive is used in Ireland

Lobbyist Name: SIPTU - Services Industrial Professional Trade Union

Specific Details: European policy on innovative pharmaceutical medicine
DPOs Lobbied: Billy Kelleher|MEP|European Parliament::Sean Kelly|MEP|European Parliament::Maria Walsh|MEP|European Parliament::Cynthia Ní Mhurchú|MEP|European Parliament::Grace O'Sullivan|MEP|European Parliament::Kathleen Funchion|MEP|European Parliament::Michael McNamara |MEP|European Parliament::Barry Cowen |MEP|European Parliament::Chris MacManus|MEP|European Parliament::Lisa Chambers|Senator|Seanad::Luke Ming Flanagan|MEP|European Parliament::Niall Blaney|Senator|Seanad::Nina Carberry|MEP|European Parliament::Aodhán Ó Ríordáin|MEP|European Parliament::Aodhán Ó Ríordáin|MEP|European Parliament::Barry Andrews|MEP|European Parliament::Ciarán Cuffe|MEP|European Parliament::Lynn Boylan|MEP|European Parliament::Regina Doherty|MEP|European Parliament
Subject Matter: European policy on innovative pharmaceutical medicine
Intended Results: To highlight to Irish MEPs, MSD Ireland’s key EU health policy priorities in advance of the European Elections in May 2024 including Better Health for All Europeans, Creating Jobs that Matter, Supporting Innovation and Encouraging Sustainability. ::To highlight to Irish MEPs, the 'MSD Policy Passport on pharmaceutical innovation' booklet which highlights some of the key policy issues at a European level to assist with understanding pharmaceutical innovation in Europe.
